t: Everything you need to know about Amazon Haul—a broad selection of products $20 or less, with most under $10
s: November 13, 2024 - U.S. beta launched in the Amazon Shopping app, featuring fashion, home, lifestyle, electronics, and other products, all backed by Amazon’s A-to-z Guarantee, with delivery times of one to two weeks.

2 days ago - Amazon opened its tenth physical bookstore in 2017; media speculation at the time suggested that Amazon planned to eventually roll out 300 to 400 bookstores around the country. All of its locations were closed in 2022 along with other retail locations under the "Amazon 4-Star" brand.
